mapper.update: update t_credit_level set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_resolution = #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_size = #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_format = #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_credit_score = #{minCreditScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_credit_score = #{maxCreditScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, min_credit_score, max_credit_score, order_no from t_credit_level where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
